us.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

us.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

us.description:
Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad — Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes.

Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery™ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit color, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colors on the canvas together to create new ones.

Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro.

Amazing Brushes
• 150 high quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Conté, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures
• All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser
• Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation

The Best Painting App for iPad
• Sorcery™, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store
• Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap
• Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts
• Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro
• Dual-texture brushes
• 64-bit color
• All device orientations are supported all the time — switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease
• 1000 levels of undo and redo are available
• Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu
• The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colors from the canvas
• The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400%

Canvas Playback Video Recording
• Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay
• You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery
• Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution

Full-Featured Color Picker
• Choose any paint color you can dream of with the intuitive color picker
• HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large color circle, color square, and opacity slider
• Your latest colors are saved to a palette automatically while you paint
• You can also save your favorite colors to a palette with drag and drop

Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos, and artwork.

us.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

us.description:
Have you ever thought about building up your own empire, without the risk of ending up sleeping under a bridge? Become the owner of a pawn shop and haggle like your life depends on it!

Start small, grow big!
Begin your journey in a rundown shack and build up your business day by day by negotiating with customers, hiring employees and partaking in auctions.
But be careful! Scammers will try to take advantage of you with fake items and if someone ever wants to sell you a questionable “insurance” better choose your next words wisely...
Each customer behaves differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits. It’s up to you to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them and how to seal the deal!
Use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire!

Dealer’s Life 2 Main Features
- The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
- A myriad of items to buy and sell with fake items to avoid (or exploit!)
- Infinite customers to haggle with, each with their own personality and appearance
- Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others.
- Auctions! For times when you crave a little bit of extra adrenaline... aaand SOLD!
- Loads of jokes and quotes from cult movies and video games

Your favorite pawn shop experience is finally getting a sequel! Haggle like your life depends on it in this funny tycoon game. You never know what is gonna stumble through that door!

us.description:
Dealer's Life is a funny tycoon game where you manage your own pawn shop. Haggle with infinite generated customers to buy and sell infinite generated items!
Have fun for hours and use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire! Thanks to procedural generation, special characters and random events you’ll never know what’s coming next!

Dealer’s Life main features:
• Infinite items to buy and sell, all procedurally generated, with fake and counterfeit items to avoid (or exploit!)
• Infinite customers to haggle with, each with his own personality and appearance, all procedurally generated. Will you manage to recognize their personality only by looking at them?
• The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
• Be the smartest and quickest bidder and beat your rivals to buy prestigious items in exciting auctions!
• Customize your character’s skills and play different games depending on what you decide to increase, finding the game style that suits you most
• Manage your pawn shop’s features: keep track of your inventory, position in town, maximum number of customers per day and many more
• Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others. Buy, repair, estimate and resell for huge gain!
• Random events, recurrent characters and different game endings will make every game a unique experience!
• Lots of humour and quotes from cult movies and videogames

Thousands of unique customers, with unique behaviors and traits: they all behave differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits which are reflected on their appearance. It’s up to you, with the help of your character Insight skill, to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them, when to push and when you will have to just accept their offer.

Try to amass enough money to transfer to a new pawn shop with a better look and better city placement: your daily number of customers will surely grow! And keep your inventory full of items, collecting legendary items to attract even more customers!

Fight the market to become the best trader out there and live the ultimate pawn shop experience with Dealer’s Life!

We are constantly improving the game, if you have any feedback about the game, your experience or anything else have a look at our Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) and contact us through our social media pages:

tr.description:
James Vanderboom's life drastically changes when he plants a special seed in the garden of the house he has inherited. Expand your bloodline by unlocking portraits in the tree of life.

Rusty Lake: Roots is the second premium point-and-click adventure by Rusty Lake, the creators of the Cube Escape series and Rusty Lake Hotel.

Features:

- Pick-up-and-play:
Easy to start but hard to put down.
- Unique storyline:
Experience the beginning and end of characters' lives and build your own family tree. 
- More than 33 levels:
The biggest Rusty Lake game so far is filled with puzzles
- Full of suspense and atmosphere:
Switching from calm to very dark moments
- Immersive soundtrack:
Each level has its own theme song and variations
- Achievements:
The tree has more secrets to unravel

Tap on the arrows, drag or swipe to navigate around the environment. Some objects you can drag. Interact with people and objects by tapping. Select found items in your inventory and tap somewhere on screen to use them.

We will unfold the Rusty Lake story one step at a time. So check RustyLake.com every day for new content and follow us: @rustylakecom.

The Past Within - Update 

To celebrate our 9-year anniversary as Rusty Lake, we’ve added a connection between Underground Blossom and The Past Within in the form of a secret mini-game. Check out our platforms to see how to establish a connection between The Past and The Future and unlock this secret mini-game in The Past Within.

Patch Notes 1.4

- Small bug fixes

Thank you for your support!
tr.description:
Note: The Past Within is a co-op only game. Both players need to own a copy of the game on their own device (mobile, tablet or computer), as well as a way to communicate with each other. Play together with a friend or find a partner on our official Discord server!

The past and future cannot be explored alone! Team up with a friend and piece together the mysteries surrounding Albert Vanderboom. Communicate what you see around you to help one another solve various puzzles and explore the worlds from different perspectives! 

The Past Within is the first co-op only point-and-click adventure set in the mysterious world of Rusty Lake.

Features:

▪ A co-op experience 
Play together with a friend, one in The Past, the other in The Future. Work together to solve the puzzles and help Rose set her father’s plan in motion!
▪ Two worlds - Two perspectives 
Both players will experience their environments in two different dimensions: 2D as well as in 3D - a first-time experience in the Rusty Lake universe!
▪ Cross-platform
As long as you can communicate with each other, you and your partner of choice can each play The Past Within on your preferred platform: Mac, PC and Nintendo Switch!
▪ Playtime & Replayability
The game contains 2 chapters and has an average play-time of 2 hours. For the full experience, we recommend replaying the game from the other perspective. Plus you can use our replayability feature for a fresh start with new solutions to all puzzles.

tr.description:
Descend into the Rusty Lake Underground and travel through the life and memories of Laura Vanderboom!

Travel from station to station, each metro stop symbolising a piece of Laura's past and future. Solve various puzzles, find the correct metro to board and uncover one of Laura’s timelines, while simultaneously helping her make sense of her life and escape the corruption of her mind!

Underground Blossom is a new point-and-click adventure developed by the creators of the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake series.

Features:

▪ A new experience in a familiar setting
Enjoy a classic Rusty Lake point-and-click puzzle adventure with a gripping story full of mysteries and, of course, puzzles.

▪ Expect to make several stops
Travel to 7 unique metro stations, each station a representation of Laura Vanderboom’s life, memories and potential future. The estimated travel time is 2 hours.

▪ You know what to do
Unravel the potential secrets hidden in each metro station, earn achievements and who knows what else you might stumble upon!

▪ Don’t forget your headphones
At each metro stop you will be greeted by an atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar, including a cello performance by Sebastiaan van Halsema!

tr.description:
A desperate letter summons detective Paul Trilby to a peculiar island town, divided by a wall and ruled by a Hospital. Regular citizens get admitted and then return without their memories. A sinister conspiracy is afoot. Can you get to the bottom of this mystery?

Use wit, curiosity and lateral thinking to puzzle your way towards a solution, helped by the local citizens you meet along the way. Remember that there is always a grain of truth in the local gossip. 

Follow the Meaning is a surreal, hand-drawn, point-and-click adventure inspired by classic titles like Samorost and the Rusty Lake series.  

Features

■ Hand-drawn art brings the offbeat world to life
■ Whimsical worldbuilding with a sinister undertone
■ Atmospheric soundtrack by Victor Butzelaar
■ A twisted mystery that awaits your diligent inspection
■ 1.5 hours average playtime

tr.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

tr.description:
Available exclusively on the App Store, meticulously designed to be beautifully powerful, and painstakingly engineered for iPad — Inspire Pro delivers an incredibly fast and realistic painting, drawing, and sketching experience that you can take with you wherever you go and use whenever inspiration strikes.

Our proprietary painting engine Sorcery™ takes full advantage of the GPU to render brush strokes with brilliant 64-bit colour, laser-sharp sub-pixel precision, and insanely fast speed. While the strokes of a wet oil paint brush look beautiful on their own, the breathtaking blending effects of a dry brush will absolutely stun you. Graze the canvas with just a bit of pressure to add a subtle blur to your artwork or use stronger pressure to actually mix existing colours on the canvas together to create new ones.

Whether you are a budding artist, seasoned professional, or somewhere in-between, you will enjoy the simplicity and power of the most intuitive and compelling illustration app for iPad, Inspire Pro.

Amazing Brushes
• 150 high-quality brushes to choose from, divided into 15 sets: Oil Paint, Airbrushes, Spray Paint, Paint Splatter, Graphite Pencils, Wax Crayons, Markers, Chalk, Charcoal, Pastels & Conté, Basic Shapes, Complex Shapes, Shape Outlines, Patterns, and Textures
• All brushes can be used as a Wet Brush, Dry Brush (Blending), or Eraser
• Over 20 different settings are available to customize brush strokes with powerful versatility and variation

The Best Painting App for iPad
• Sorcery™, the fastest 64-bit painting engine on the App Store
• Full-fledged Apple Pencil support for pressure, tilt angle, orientation, and double-tap
• Smart Keyboard support with over 20 context-sensitive keyboard shortcuts
• Create a canvas of any size up to 16K (64MP) on iPad Pro
• Dual-texture brushes
• 64-bit colour
• All device orientations are supported all the time — switch from portrait to landscape painting with ease
• 1000 levels of undo and redo are available
• Touch and slide hotspots can be used to quickly change brush size, opacity, and pressure without opening a menu
• The eyedropper tool can be used with a touch and hold gesture to select paint colours from the canvas
• The canvas can be moved around, rotated, and zoomed in and out up to 6400%

Canvas Playback Video Recording
• Brush strokes are automatically recorded as you paint without any delay
• You can play the video of your artwork being created stroke-by-stroke directly in the gallery
• Exported videos are high quality HD at up to 1080p resolution

Full-Featured Colour Picker
• Choose any paint colour you can dream of with the intuitive colour picker
• HSB and RGB sliders accompany a large colour circle, colour square, and opacity slider
• Your latest colours are saved to a palette automatically while you paint
• You can also save your favourite colours to a palette with drag and drop

Visit snowCanoe.com to check out more screenshots, videos and artwork.

tr.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

tr.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

Henry was the lead animator at Joey Drew Studios in its 1930s heyday, a studio that was best known for producing animated cartoons of their most popular and beloved character, Bendy. Many years later Henry receives a mysterious invitation from Joey Drew himself to return to the old cartoon workshop. Journey deep into the sketchy madness of this twisted cartoon nightmare. 

Fight the darkness. Escape the Ink Demon. Fear the Machine.

• Varied Game Play! - First person combat, horror, puzzles, stealth and numerous hidden secrets.
• A Beautiful Cartoon World! - Lovingly crafted by a small indie studio.
• A Global Bendy Community! - Delve deep into the mystery and join the discussion at joeydrewstudios.com

tr.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

In This War Of Mine you do not play as an elite soldier, rather a group of civilians trying to survive in a besieged city; struggling with lack of food, medicine and constant danger from snipers and hostile scavengers. The game provides an experience of war seen from an entirely new angle. 

The pace of This War of Mine is imposed by the day and night cycle. During the day snipers outside stop you from leaving your refuge, so you need to focus on maintaining your hideout: crafting, trading and taking care of your survivors. At night, take one of your civilians on a mission to scavenge through a set of unique locations for items that will help you stay alive. 

Make life-and-death decisions driven by your conscience. Try to protect everybody from your shelter or sacrifice some of them for longer-term survival. During war, there are no good or bad decisions; there is only survival. The sooner you realize that, the better.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
It's been two years since This War of Mine global release and we're still expanding the experience. This new free DLC, created especially for the Anniversary Edition, adds new characters, new locations to explore, and most importantly - a whole new ending, leading to a different outcome to the game. The dilemma though remains the same – how far will you go, to protect the ones you care about? 

Key Features:
• Inspired by real-life events 
• Control your survivors and manage your shelter 
• Craft weapons, alcohol, beds or stoves – anything that helps you survive 
• Make decisions - an often unforgiving and emotionally difficult experience 
• Randomized world and characters every time you start a new game 
• Charcoal-stylized aesthetics to complement the game's theme

This War of Mine experience is now broadened with "The Little Ones" expansion. "The Little Ones" explores the hardships of wartime survival as seen from an entirely new perspective―that of a child. This DLC puts you in charge of a group of adults and children stuck in a besieged city, struggling with basic necessities. TWoM: The Little Ones focuses not only on the reality of enduring war, but also on how even in times of conflict, kids are still kids: they laugh, cry, play, and see the world differently. In addition to thinking about survival, you'll have to summon your inner child to understand how to protect the little ones. Their youth, and their future, are in your hands.

• Experience the biggest expansion to This War of Mine
• Protect innocent children
• Craft toys, play with kids, and be the caretaker they need
• Meet new adult civilians in scenarios with children

PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

tr.description:
Have you ever thought about building up your own empire, without the risk of ending up sleeping under a bridge? Become the owner of a pawn shop and haggle like your life depends on it!

Start small, grow big!
Begin your journey in a rundown shack and build up your business day by day by negotiating with customers, hiring employees and partaking in auctions.
But be careful! Scammers will try to take advantage of you with fake items and if someone ever wants to sell you a questionable “insurance” better choose your next words wisely...
Each customer behaves differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits. It’s up to you to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them and how to seal the deal!
Use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire!

Dealer’s Life 2 Main Features
- The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
- A myriad of items to buy and sell with fake items to avoid (or exploit!)
- Infinite customers to haggle with, each with their own personality and appearance
- Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others.
- Auctions! For times when you crave a little bit of extra adrenaline... aaand SOLD!
- Loads of jokes and quotes from cult movies and video games

Your favorite pawn shop experience is finally getting a sequel! Haggle like your life depends on it in this funny tycoon game. You never know what is gonna stumble through that door!

tr.description:
Dealer's Life is a funny tycoon game where you manage your own pawn shop. Haggle with infinite generated customers to buy and sell infinite generated items!
Have fun for hours and use all your negotiation, psychology and management skills to create your pawn empire! Thanks to procedural generation, special characters and random events you’ll never know what’s coming next!

Dealer’s Life main features:
• Infinite items to buy and sell, all procedurally generated, with fake and counterfeit items to avoid (or exploit!)
• Infinite customers to haggle with, each with his own personality and appearance, all procedurally generated. Will you manage to recognize their personality only by looking at them?
• The most technically advanced negotiation engine you’ve ever seen
• Be the smartest and quickest bidder and beat your rivals to buy prestigious items in exciting auctions!
• Customize your character’s skills and play different games depending on what you decide to increase, finding the game style that suits you most
• Manage your pawn shop’s features: keep track of your inventory, position in town, maximum number of customers per day and many more
• Hire employees to help you with your job: search for the best experts, restorers, profilers, analysts, clerks and many others. Buy, repair, estimate and resell for huge gain!
• Random events, recurrent characters and different game endings will make every game a unique experience!
• Lots of humour and quotes from cult movies and videogames

Thousands of unique customers, with unique behaviors and traits: they all behave differently during negotiations according to their unique psychological traits which are reflected on their appearance. It’s up to you, with the help of your character Insight skill, to understand who you have in front of you, how to treat them, when to push and when you will have to just accept their offer.

Try to amass enough money to transfer to a new pawn shop with a better look and better city placement: your daily number of customers will surely grow! And keep your inventory full of items, collecting legendary items to attract even more customers!

Fight the market to become the best trader out there and live the ultimate pawn shop experience with Dealer’s Life!

We are constantly improving the game, if you have any feedback about the game, your experience or anything else have a look at our Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) and contact us through our social media pages:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DealersLife
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DealersLife

pt.description:
A Klei Entertainment se associou com nossos amigos da CAPY, criadores do Superbrothers: Sword and Sworcery, Super Time Force e Below, para levar aos fãs de Don't Starve a expansão de jogo solo mais recente: Don't Starve: Náufragos!

No Don't Starve: Náufragos, Wilson se encontra naufragado em um arquipélago tropical. Ele vai precisar aprender todas as manhas de sobrevivência de novo nesse ambiente repleto de novos biomas, estações e criaturas. 

Não deixe a brisa tropical embalar você em um falso estado de segurança, o mundo pode ser diferente, mas ainda é tanto implacável quanto inóspito. Você vai descobrir rapidamente que essas ilhas estão transbordando com coisas que querem te matar.

Principais Recursos:

Navegue pelo oceano aberto: construa um barco e ice velas para a aventura! 

Explore um mundo completamente novo: o mundo todo é diferente. Explore novos biomas repletos de novos recursos. Procure novas fontes de comida. Corra para salvar sua pele de uma horda de novas criaturas. 

Admiráveis estações novas: um conjunto de estações de inspiração tropical vão tentar ao máximo te matar. 

Crie novas receitas: construa diversas bugigangas novas para tentar sobreviver nessas ilhas inóspitas.

pt.description:
Robert Hill acorda em uma Instituição Psiquiátrica com perda de memória severa. Acompanhe a rotina rigorosa da instituição, explore os sonhos dele e ajude-o a recuperar suas memórias.

The White Door é uma nova aventura point-and-click desenvolvida pelos criadores das séries Cube Escape e Rusty Lake.

Características:

■ Pegar e jogar
Fácil de começar, difícil de parar

■ História interativa
Acompanhe a rotina e recupere as memórias de forma lúdica, com quebra-cabeças e enigmas

■ Uma aventura Rusty Lake única com tela dividida
Vivencie a estadia de Robert Hill na Instituição Psiquiátrica de Rusty Lake de forma inovadora

■ Atmosfera envolvente

pt.releaseNotes: Obrigado por jogar Rusty Lake Paradise! Consertamos alguns bugs nesta versão nova.
pt.description:
Jakob, o filho mais velho da família Eilander, retorna à ilha Paradise após a morte misteriosa da mãe dele. Desde que ela morreu, a ilha parece ter sido amaldiçoada por dez pragas. Encontre as memórias ocultas da mãe e participe de estranhos rituais de família para deter as pragas.

Rusty Lake Paradise é a terceira aventura de point-and-click de Rusty Lake, os criadores da série Cube Escape, Rusty Lake Hotel e Rusty Lake: Roots.

Características

- Pegar e jogar:
Fácil de começar, mas difícil de parar.
- História única:
O primeiro jogo de aventura baseado nas dez pragas do Egito.
- Uma experiência inesquecível de quebra-cabeça:
Cada praga traz a própria atmosfera, suspense e uma variedade de charadas da Rusty Lake.
- Gráficos envolventes:
As pinturas de fundo foram feitas a mão pelo pintor holandês Johan Scherft.
- Trilha sonora imersiva:
Cada praga tem sua própria música tema e variações.
- Conquistas:
A ilha tem mais segredos para descobrir.

Os mistérios de Rusty Lake serão revelados um de cada vez. Então visite RustyLake.com todos os dias para ver conteúdos novos e nos siga: @rustylakecom

pt.releaseNotes: -Corrigido problema em que a interface do usuário parou de responder após usar o inventário.
pt.description:
***OBSERVAÇÃO: O Don't Starve exige iOS 8 e pelo menos um iPhone 5, iPad 3 ou iPad mini 2. Devido a limitações de memória, ele não roda em dispositivos mais antigos.***

Don’t Starve: Pocket Edition leva o sucesso do jogo de PC, adorado por mais de 4 milhões de jogadores, para o iPhone e iPad. Agora você pode se aventurar no jogo de sobrevivência em regiões inóspitas, repleto de ciência e magia em qualquer lugar! 

Jogue com Wilson, um intrépido Cientista Elegante que foi preso e transportado para um mundo inóspito misterioso. Wilson precisa aprender a explorar seu ambiente e seus habitantes para conseguir escapar e encontrar seu caminho de volta para casa. 

Entre num mundo estranho e inexplorado, repleto de criaturas estranhas, perigos e surpresas. Junte recursos para criar itens e estruturas que combinam com seu estilo de sobrevivência. Jogue e vá desvelando os mistérios dessa terra estranha. 

********************************************************

Prêmios:
- Indicado ao grande prêmio do Festival de Jogos Independentes (Independent Games Festival)
- Indicado ao prêmio de excelência em design do Festival de Jogos Independentes (Independent Games Festival)
- Indicado ao prêmio de público no Festival de Jogos Independentes (Independent Games Festival)
- Escolha do editor no Capsule Computers
- Jogo do ano do Indie Game Reviewer

Principais recursos:

Otimizado para comandos por toque: A nova interface de toque intuitiva permite que você explore, lute, crie e gerencie seu inventário com facilidade.

Sobrevivência e exploração de mundo implacável: Sem instruções. Sem ajuda. Sem orientações detalhadas. Comece com nada e crie, cace, pesquise, cultive e lute para sobreviver.

Visuais sombrios e excêntricos: personagens 2D e criaturas estranhas habitam um mundo 3D único.

Novos mundos gerados aleatoriamente: Quer um mapa novo? Sem problema! A qualquer momento você pode gerar um novo mundo vivo que te odeia e quer que você morra.

pt.description:
A vida de James Vanderboom vira de cabeça para baixo depois que ele planta uma semente especial no jardim da casa que herdou. Amplie sua linhagem sanguínea desbloqueando retratos na árvore genealógica. 

Rusty Lake: Roots é a segunda grande aventura de apontar e clicar da Rusty Lake, criadora da série Cube Escape e do Rusty Lake Hotel.

Principais recursos: 
- Intuitivo: fácil de começar, mas difícil de parar. 
- História exclusiva: vivencie o início e o fim da vida dos personagens e monte sua própria árvore genealógica. 
- Mais de 33 fases: o maior jogo da Rusty Lake até hoje está repleto de quebra-cabeças 
- Clima repleto de suspense: da calmaria a momentos de grande tensão em um piscar de olhos 
- Trilha sonora envolvente: cada fase tem uma música tema e variações 
- Conquistas: a árvore tem mais segredos para desvendar

pt.releaseNotes:
The Past Within - Atualização

Para comemorar o aniversário de 9 anos de Rusty Lake, adicionamos uma ligação entre Underground Blossom e The Past Within no formato de um minigame secreto. Visite nossas plataformas para descobrir como fazer a conexão entre o Passado e o Futuro e desbloquear o minigame secreto em The Past Within.

Lista de alterações 1.3

- Novo segredo: Um minigame secreto que só pode ser encontrado usando as informações da atualização mais recente de Underground Blossom!
- Correção de bugs.

Obrigado pelo apoio!
pt.description:
Aviso: The Past Within é um jogo exclusivamente cooperativo. Os dois jogadores precisam possuir uma cópia do jogo nos seus dispositivos (celular, tablet ou computador) e uma forma de se comunicar um com o outro. Jogue com um amigo ou encontre um parceiro no nosso servidor oficial do Discord!

Não é possível explorar o passado e o futuro sozinho! Junte-se a um amigo e desvende os mistérios de Albert Vanderboom. Comuniquem o que estiverem vendo para ajudar um ao outro a solucionar diversos enigmas e explorem os mundos de perspectivas diferentes!

The Past Within é a primeira aventura point-and-click exclusivamente cooperativa do misterioso mundo de Rusty Lake.

Características:

▪ Uma experiência cooperativa 
Jogue com um amigo: um no Passado e um no Futuro. Trabalhem juntos para solucionar enigmas e ajudar Rose a realizar o plano do pai!
▪ Dois mundos - Duas perspectivas 
Os jogadores vão explorar o ambiente em duas dimensões diferentes: 2D e 3D - uma experiência inédita no universo Rusty Lake!
▪ Multiplataforma
Desde que tenham como se comunicar, você e seu parceiro podem jogar The Past Within cada um na plataforma que preferir: Mac, PC e Nintendo Switch!
▪ Tempo de jogo & Rejogabilidade
O jogo tem dois capítulos e uma duração média de 2 horas. Para ter a experiência completa, sugerimos jogar novamente pela outra perspectiva. Além disso, você pode usar o nosso recurso de rejogabilidade para recomeçar do zero com novas soluções para todos os quebra-cabeças.

pt.releaseNotes: Obrigado por jogar Underground Blossom, consertamos alguns bugs nesta versão!
pt.description:
Embarque no Metrô Rusty Lake e viaje pela vida e pelas memórias de Laura Vanderboom!

Viaje de estação em estação, com cada parada do metrô simbolizando uma parte do passado e do futuro de Laura. Desvende vários quebra-cabeças, encontre o trem certo, explore uma das linhas do tempo de Laura e ajude-a a entender sua própria vida e a escapar da corrupção de sua própria mente!

Underground Blossom é uma nova aventura point-and-click dos criadores da série Cube Escape e Rusty Lake.

Características:

▪ Uma experiência nova em um ambiente familiar
Aproveite uma clássica aventura point-and-click de Rusty Lake com uma história cheia de mistérios e, é claro, quebra-cabeças.

▪ Espere várias paradas
Viaje por 7 estações de metrô únicas, cada uma representando a vida, as memórias e o futuro potencial de Laura Vanderboom. O tempo de viagem estimado é de 2 horas.

▪ Você sabe o que fazer
Desvende os possíveis segredos escondidos em cada estação de metrô, ganhe conquistas e descubra o que mais você pode encontrar!

▪ Não esqueça os fones de ouvido 
Você será recebido em cada estação de metrô com uma trilha sonora atmosférica de Victor Butzelaar, incluindo uma performance de violoncelo de Sebastiaan van Halsema!

pt.releaseNotes: Obrigado por jogar Follow the Meaning! Consegue achar a nova conquista secreta?
pt.description:
Uma carta desesperada traz o detetive Paul Trilby a uma cidadezinha peculiar em uma ilha, dividida por um muro e governada por um Hospital. Cidadãos comuns são internados e voltam sem memórias. Tem uma conspiração sinistra acontecendo. Você consegue desvendar esse mistério?

Use a perspicácia, a curiosidade e o pensamento lateral para desvendar a solução, sempre com a ajuda de cidadãos locais que você encontrará no caminho. Lembre-se que sempre tem um grão de verdade nas fofocas da cidade.

Follow the Meaning é uma aventura point-and-click surreal desenhada à mão inspirada por jogos clássicos como Samorost e a série Rusty Lake.

Características

■ Desenhos feitos à mão que trazem vida a esse mundo inusitado
■ Um mundo fantástico com um lado sombrio
■ Trilha sonora atmosférica de Victor Butzelaar
■ Um mistério sinistro que aguarda a sua inspeção meticulosa
■ Duração média de 1h30

pt.sellerName: Hangzhou Beesoft Information Technology Co., Ltd.
pt.description:
WHAT IS ScanGo?
ScanGo is a little, simple, flexible, easy-to-use app with kinds of features satisfying different situations in your iPhone. It allows you to scan documents, certificates, credit cards, invoices, receipts, tickets and any paper with high quality image & PDF output. Also, you can extract text by OCR function from any scans just by one tap.
It is also a camera scanner with concise, efficient user interface whose main tone is black & white with teal & chrome yellow embellished throughout the app. 

HOW TO SCAN DOCS?
- Scan everything by one click, of course you can choose to scan from Photos or Camera.
- Edit docs after scanning immediately, including add, rotate, adjust, reorder and delete pages.
- Rotate, Crop and Adjust filter to get high quality scans.
- Provided five filter modes to enhance your scans - Original, B&W 1, B&W 2, Color, Grayscale. What’s more, each filter can be adjusted for its own Brightness, Contrast, Saturation and Sharpness.

HOW TO MANAGE DOCS?
- The Recents module on home page shows your recently added docs, which helps to find them faster.
- Add folders and sub-folders to manage scanned docs.
- Rename folders and documents to make them more distinguishable.
- Important and urgent documents can be Starred for faster access.
- Search function helps to find the doc you need from a dizzying array.
- Every folder, doc and page can be shared with email, Dropbox, Google Drive, Evernote etc. or Wifi directly.
- Save scans as JPEG to Photos.
- Move/Copy/Delete docs and pages.
- Print scans directly within app once you connect to a Printer.
- Fax scans directly if you have Fax Pro app installed.

AFRAID OF DATA LOSS?
ScanGo supports syncing data with iCloud. 

MAKE THE APP MORE EFFICIENT
CONVENIENT - Turn on the camera immediately whenever you open the app.
HANDY - Save scans to Photos automatically.
EASY - Auto edge detection and enhancement.
SIMPLE - Share docs and folders in default PDF size.
SECURE - Protect your documents with passcode.

MORE QUESTIONS?
If you have any problems with ScanGo, please email us at scango@beesoft.io, we’ll help to figure it out asap.

pt.releaseNotes: Esta atualização contém várias correções de erros e pequenas melhorias à medida que continuamos a trabalhar no refinamento da aplicação para manter a sua elevada qualidade.
pt.description:
Disponível exclusivamente na App Store, meticulosamente concebido para ser maravilhosamente poderoso e desenvolvido minuciosamente para iPad - o Inspire Pro proporciona uma experiência incrivelmente rápida e realista de pintura, desenho e esboço, que pode levar consigo onde quer que vá e utilizar sempre que a inspiração o surpreender.

O nosso mecanismo de pintura proprietário Sorcery™ aproveita todo o potencial do GPU para oferecer pinceladas com cores brilhantes de 64 bits, precisão sub-pixel com nitidez laser e velocidade extremamente rápida. Enquanto as pinceladas de um pincel de óleo molhado ficam lindas individualmente, os efeitos deslumbrantes de mistura de um pincel seco irão surpreendê-lo absolutamente. Varra a tela com apenas um pouco de pressão para adicionar uma distorção subtil à sua ilustração ou aplique uma pressão mais forte para misturar efetivamente as cores existentes na tela para criar cores novas.

Quer seja um artista em ascensão, um profissional experiente ou alguém numa posição intermédia, desfrutará da simplicidade e do poder da aplicação de ilustração mais intuitiva e atraente para iPad, o Inspire Pro.

Pincéis
• 150 pincéis de alta qualidade à sua escolha, divididos em 15 conjuntos: Tinta a Óleo, Aerógrafos, Tinta em Spray, Respingos de Tinta, Lápis de Grafite, Lápis de Cera, Marcadores, Giz, Carvão, Pastéis e Conté, Formas Básicas, Formas Complexas, Esboço de Formas, Padrões e Texturas
• Todos os pincéis podem ser usados como um pincel húmido, pincel seco (mistura) ou borracha
• Estão disponíveis mais de 20 configurações diferentes para personalizar pinceladas com grande versatilidade e variação

Pintura
• Sorcery™, o motor de pintura de 64 bits mais rápido na App Store
• Suporte Apple Pencil completo para pressão, ângulo de inclinação, orientação e toque duplo
• Suporte Smart Keyboard com mais de 20 atalhos de teclado sensíveis ao contexto
• Crie uma tela de qualquer tamanho até 16K (64MP) em iPad Pro
• Pincéis de dupla textura
• Cor de 64 bits
• Todas as orientações do dispositivo são suportadas em qualquer momento — mude facilmente de pintura em retrato para paisagem
• Estão disponíveis 1000 níveis de anular e refazer
• Podem ser usados hotspots de toque e de deslize para mudar rapidamente o tamanho do pincel, opacidade e pressão sem abrir um menu
• A ferramenta conta-gotas pode ser usada com um gesto de toque e manter para selecionar as cores da tinta a partir da tela
• A tela pode ser movida, girada, ampliada e reduzida até 6400%

Gravação de vídeo de reprodução da tela
• As pinceladas são gravadas automaticamente enquanto pinta sem qualquer atraso
• Pode reproduzir o vídeo da sua ilustração a ser criada pincelada a pincelada diretamente na galeria
• Um Vídeo de reprodução da tela pode ser exportado para as suas Fotos ou para qualquer outro destino
• Os vídeos exportados são HD de alta qualidade com resolução até 1080p

Selecionador de cores
• Escolha qualquer cor de tinta que possa imaginar com o selecionador de cores intuitivo
• Os controlos deslizadores HSB e RGB acompanham um grande círculo de cores, um quadrado de cores e um controlo deslizante de opacidade
• As suas cores mais recentes são automaticamente guardadas numa paleta enquanto pinta
• Também pode guardar as suas cores favoritas numa paleta com arrastar e soltar

Visite snowCanoe.com para testar mais captações de ecrã, vídeos e ilustrações.

pt.description:
Cyber Manhunt is a Cyber-Style, Realistic- Society theme, Story-Rich indie game. The game taked place in the Republic of Alivia with some different theme stories ,but the fate of the characters is closely related in there. It will focus on social issues liking big data, hacking, citizen privacy etc... 

We want to reveal the profound themes behind the stories with wonderful plots and gamification. And let players pay more attention to Cyber Violence and Privacy Breaches.

[Contents]
◆Chapter I: Death of a Programmer
The CEO of a company committed suicide by jumping off a building, and claimed that he was extorted tens of millions by his wife. While his wife posted photos of domestic violence on social networks. Who is lying?
◆Chapter II: Invisible Eyes
The indecent video of the female college student went viral on the Internet. At this moment, she was already socially dead. Who is the initiator? Who should protect the safety of women?
◆Chapter III: The Evidence Vanishes
The student council president, who is both excellent in character and study, suddenly disappeared. The bullying incident made the case more complicated. Who is the murderer and who is the victim?
◆Chapter IV: The Price of Humiliation
The female singer has been exposed again! Threatening letters, hype, the suicide of former girl group members... The Internet has set off a public opinion carnival again!
◆Chapter V: Immortal Code
When the society is in madness, are you willing to join the Immortal Code to obtain true love and immortality?
◆DLC: Home Sweet Home
Behind this seemingly sweet and happy family, everyone has their own secrets, what is the truth hidden behind?!
◆DLC: Hello World!
Senior researcher of Titan Dr. Lucrezia died in a terrible car accident on the spot, but the fellow Benjamin took escape from death. But he did not realize that he was about to be involved in a huge conspiracy…

[Features]
◆Highly Immersive: Gamers play as a hacker in the game, accepts the commission of the company, and solve dangerous incidents.
◆Rich Gameplay: There are lots of features of Social Engineering in the game, which is including Detecting, Tracking, Puzzles-Solving, Destroying and Hacking etc..
◆Wonderful Plots: Each chapter in the game will reflect a current hot social topic, such as: Sneak Shot, Cyber Violence, School Bullying, etc...
◆Multiple Roles: There are many different roles in this game with a flash of personality. Their stories would be dug by yourself.
◆Fully Dubbing: All the characters in the game have their own voice actors that make the game experience more immersive.
◆Original Music: There are some original songs in the game, and the lyrics and vocals are all completed by the studio.

[Gameplay]
◆Web Search: You should collect basic information about the targets through the Internet search.
◆Database: You can use the database to get deep information about targets.
◆Crack: You would get passwords based on the obtained target's information, and use it to log in to accounts of different platforms.
◆Chat: The exciting thing is that you need to chat with targets by disguise and use the information to get the trust of the target.
◆Phishing: You can send phishing links to hack the targets' hardware devices, and get private information.
◆Picture Analysis: You can get valuable information and relevant clues from pictures.
More advanced hacking methods will be unlocked later!

pt.description:
Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light direction—plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance.

Know where the light will be—before you go.

Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a location—hours or days in advance.

Whether you’re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit.

--

Plan with Precision

• Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization
See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction.

• Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts
Know the precise windows when light is at its best.

• Moonrise & Moonset Planning
Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work.

• Forecasting & Location Planning
Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere.

• Offline Access
All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

pt.description:
"If you've not already played this brilliant, heart-wrenching game, then mobile is as good a place as any to let it completely destroy you." - , 9/10, Pocket Gamer UK

"This War of Mine isn’t exactly “fun,” but it’s definitely a game worth playing." , 9/10, 148apps

"I'm really excited to go home and download 11 bit studios' title on my iPad" , Game Informer

Em "This War of Mine" você não irá jogar com um soldado de elite, mas sim com um grupo de civis tentando sobreviver em uma cidade sitiada, lutando contra a falta de alimentos, medicamentos e constante perigo de franco-atiradores e catadores hostis. O jogo oferece uma experiência de guerra vista de um ângulo inteiramente novo.

O andamento do jogo "This War of Mine" se dá pelos ciclos, dia e noite. Durante o dia franco-atiradores irá impedi-lo de sair de seu abrigo, então seu objetivo será: manter seu abrigo seguro, construir melhorias, negociar com catadores e/ou vizinhos e cuidar de seus sobreviventes. À noite, você selecionará um de seus civis para ir coletar suprimentos nos locais indicados no mapa, esses itens coletados irão ajudar você e seu grupo a permanecerem vivos.

Tome decisões de vida ou morte seguindo a sua consciência. Tente proteger todos de seu abrigo, ou então, se necessário, sacrifique alguém para a sobrevivência da maioria. Durante a guerra, não há nenhuma decisão boa ou ruim. Somente a vontade de sobreviver. Quanto mais cedo você entender isso, melhor.

This War of Mine: Anniversary Edition
Dois anos já se passaram desde o lançamento global de This War of Mine, e ainda estamos expandindo a experiência do jogo. Este novo DLC grátis, criado especialmente para a Edição de Aniversário, adiciona novos personagens, novos locais para explorar e, o mais importante: um final inédito, que leva a uma nova conclusão do jogo. No entanto, o dilema continua o mesmo: o quão longe você iria para proteger seus entes queridos?

This War of Mine:
• Inspirado em fatos reais
• Controle seus sobreviventes e gerencie seu abrigo
• Armas artesanais, álcool, camas ou fogões. Algo que ajude você a sobreviver
• Tome decisões. Uma experiência emocionalmente difícil e muitas vezes implacável
• Clima e personagens aleatórios, cada vez que você começar um novo jogo
• Estilo esfumaçado para complementar o tema do jogo


PLEASE NOTE: This game is optimized for latest devices. While playing on older devices such as iPhone 4s or iPad 2 you might experience lower frame rates.

A groundbreaking roguelite experience awaits you:
◆ A unique fusion of deck-building and tactical grid-based combat.
◆ Innovative multi-card playing mechanics deliver a fresh strategic twist.

As a strategy game designed for hardcore players, Lost in Fantaland offers:
◆ Randomly generated battlefields and map nodes, creating diverse and dynamic combat scenarios.
◆ Six distinct classes, each with a completely different deck-building playstyle.
◆ Over 300 cards and 100 artifacts and items — every run is a brand-new adventure full of surprises!
◆ Progressive difficulty across multiple runs, testing your strategy and adaptability.
◆ Fragmented progress saving, allowing you to play in short bursts or dive into a full 90-minute session whenever you like.

pt.description:
Já pensou em construir o seu próprio império, sem correr o risco de dormir embaixo da ponte? Torne-se o dono de uma loja de penhores e negocie como sua vida dependesse disso!

Comece por baixo, suba às estrelas!
Comece sua jornada em um barraco acabado e administre seu negócio diariamente ao pechinchar com clientes, contratar funcionários e participar de leilões.
Mas tome cuidado! Golpistas tentarão tirar vantagem de você com falsificações e é melhor escolher suas palavras com sabedoria se alguém tentar te vender um "seguro" questionável...
Cada cliente se comporta de maneira diferente durante as negociações, de acordo com seus tratos psicológicos únicos. O seu trabalho é entender quem está na sua frente, como tratá-lo e como fechar o negócio!
Use todas as suas habilidades em negociação, psicologia e gerenciamento para criar o seu império dos penhores!

Dealer’s Life 2: Características Principais
- A mecânica de negociação mais avançada tecnicamente que você já viu
- Uma infinidade de itens para comprar e vender, com falsificações e réplicas para se evitar (ou aproveitar!)
- Infinitos clientes para se negociar, cada um com sua própria personalidade e aparência
- Contrate funcionários para te ajudar em seu trabalho: procure os melhores peritos, restauradores, mentalistas, analistas, balconistas e muitos outros
- Leilões! Pra todas as vezes que estiver louco por adrenalina... eeee VENDIDO!
- Muito humor e citações de filmes cult e videogames

A sua experiência de loja de penhores favorita finalmente ganhou uma continuação! Negocie como se sua vida dependesse disso nesse divertido jogo de simulação. Você nunca sabe o que pode passar por aquela porta!

pt.description:
Dealer's Life é um divertido jogo de simulação onde você gerencia a sua própria loja de penhores. Pechinche com clientes gerados infinitamente para comprar e vender itens gerados infinitamente!
Divirta-se por horas e use todas as suas habilidades de negociação, psicologia e gerenciamento para criar o seu império dos penhores! Graças a geração processual, personagens especiais e eventos aleatórios, você nunca saberá o que te espera!

Dealer’s Life características principais:
• Infinitos itens para se comprar e vender, todos gerados por processos, com falsificações e itens piratas para se evitar (ou aproveitar!)
• Infinitos clientes para se pechinchar, cada um com sua própria personalidade e aparência, todos gerados por processos. Será que você consegue perceber a sua personalidade só de olhar pra um deles?
• A mecânica de negociação mais avançada que você já viu.
• Seja o comprador mais rápido e esperto para derrotar os seus rivais e comprar itens de prestígio em leilões de tirar o fôlego!
• Personalize as suas habilidades (Competência, Carisma, Perspicácia e Sorte) e jogue de forma diferente, dependendo do que você decidir aumentar, encontrando o estilo mais adequado a você mesmo.
• Gerencie as características da sua loja de penhores: fique do olho no estoque, localização na cidade, número máximo de clientes por dia e muito mais
• Contrate funcionários para te ajudar com o trabalho duro: procure os melhores peritos, restauradores, analistas, balconistas e muitos outros. Compre, repare, estime e revenda por um lucro absurdo!
• Eventos aleatórios, personagens recorrentes e diferentes finais de jogo vão fazer de cada partida uma experiência única!
• Divirta-se com um humor inteligente baseado em filmes cult e cultura gamer

Milhares de clientes diferentes, com comportamentos e características diferentes: todos se comportam da sua própria forma ao negociar, de acordo com suas personalidades que são refletidas em sua aparência. Cabe a você, com a ajuda da perspicácia do seu personagem, perceber quem está bem na sua frente: como lidar com ele, quando apertar e quando você deve simplesmente aceitar a sua oferta.

Tente juntar dinheiro o bastante até mudar para uma loja maior e melhor localizada: o número diário de clientes vai aumentar, com certeza! Mantenha o seu estoque cheio de itens, colecionando itens lendários para atrair ainda mais clientes!

Enfrente o mercado para ser o melhor negociante dessas bandas e viva a experiência de pechinchar em uma loja de penhores com Dealer’s Life!

Nós estamos constantemente melhorando o nosso jogo, se você quiser compartilhar feedback, sua experiência ou qualquer outra coisa, dê uma olhada no nosso Roadmap ( https://trello.com/b/nAAmRDHM ) e entre em contato através das nossas páginas nas redes sociais:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DealersLife
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DealersLife
